content.question: In Thomas Jeffersonâ€™s design of Monticello, the influence of the ancient Roman Pantheon is evident in the

choices.label: combination of a domed central plan and a porticoed entrance
use of hidden concrete elements masked by a brick and marble facade
combination of different classical orders to visually structure the facade
use of a rectangular plan with multiple entrances leading in different directions

content.answer: combination of a domed central plan and a porticoed entrance

topic.text: 4.1: Interactions Within and Across Cultures in Later European and American Art

skill.text: Skill 4.C: Explain the influence of a specific work of art (or group of related works of art) on other artistic production within or across cultures.
